import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LocalService } from '../local.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor (private localStore: LocalService, private route : ActivatedRoute, private router : Router) {} login : string = ''; logged : boolean = false; ngOnInit () { this.route.queryParamMap.subscribe(params => { console.log(params); this.login = params.get('UserLogin') || ''; } ); } }
